name: Only One Rail to Mars
description:
A Space Shump (Shoot Em Up) but instead of full freedom the player is confined to the one and only rail to Mars.

Made for the GameMaker's Toolkit GameJam 2019: "Only One". We missed the deadline because of a single error that caused the packaged version of the game to not initialize properly. This build fixes the error; every other aspect of the game has been left untouched (so it is still very much a 2-day game jam game.

The Windows 64 version is better than the HTML5 version which has some graphical issues.
